item.title: NavAssist : The project that got me into Deep Learning
item.description: Little Bit about NavAssist The YOLOv5 model has been meticulously fine-tuned and trained on a custom dataset comprising over 16,000 images, designed to capture Indian surroundings. This finetuned model achieves up to 70% precision in car detection and an overall precision of 65.4% for detecting all vehicles, all while maintaining real-time processing capabilities at 25 frames per second. In addition, the model has undergone pruning to enhance resource efficiency, allowing it to run on lightweight devices such as the Jetson Nano.
